item.description:

-You will need your own TikTok Shop account
-30 videos over approximately 30 days

Looking for skilled creators and beginner creators.

We offer commission and bonuses!

item.title: Transform Longform YouTube Content into Short-form - Upwork
item.description:
We have long form video projects in Premiere Pro, and we would like to turn them into 10 different 1.5ish minute TikToks/Instagram Reels for $30 each.

The milestones will go $30 every time one is completed.  

Also, you will have to upload the TikToks on a new account yourself. You must not have any banned TikTok accounts on your phone.

To view our long form videos, here is our YouTube channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@RealWealthVault

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 30, 2024 20:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: Youtube Shorts Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a video editor to work 3 hours a day, for 5 days in total. You will be assigned 3 reels to create every day, and then upload to a channel. You will need to be able to follow a specific set of instructions in English.

The ideal candidate should be familiar with editing YouTube shorts. You should know how to use gaussian blur effects, add subtitles, add general filters, and when to cut videos into shorts. You should also be familiar with how to download videos from YouTube to clip into shorts. You should have an eye for viral content.

Preferably you should be using Adobe Premiere, but another similar video editor is also fine.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 20:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Short SEO Optimizer - Upwork
item.description:
You will work 3 hours a day for 5 days. Looking for an experienced YouTube Shorts SEO expert. You will work with a video editor to optimize the video title, description, tags, and settings of YouTube Shorts videos. You will be directly responsible for doing final review/publishing videos on a YouTube Channel.

The ideal candidate should be familiar with what keywords to use to attract the most viewers for a YouTube short.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 20:50 UTC
Category: SEO

item.title: Video Editor for Furniture Business Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to create engaging Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok videos for advertisements. The videos will be compiled from footage captured at customers' homes, showcasing our furniture products. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing promotional videos and a strong understanding of social media platforms. Attention to detail and creativity are crucial in transforming raw footage into visually appealing and compelling videos. The successful candidate should be proficient in video editing software and have the ability to collaborate with our marketing team to deliver high-quality content. If you have a passion for storytelling through video and can meet deadlines effectively, we would love to hear from you.

Relevant skills:
- Video editing
- Promotional video creation
- Social media marketing
- Attention to detail
- Collaboration with marketing team

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 20:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Graphic Design
Country: Canada
click to apply
